objects.text:
• Elegant Gold Hardware
• Premium Faux Leather
• Spacious Design
• Decorative Charms

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek, fashion-forward design with a dark, elegant background divided into subtle quadrants using varying dark tones. Diagonal and horizontal gold lines intersect across the canvas, adding a sophisticated visual framework. A luxury tote bag is prominently displayed on the right side, enhanced with gold elements that match the surrounding line details. On the left side, the brand name (id: "brand_name") is displayed in bold gold above the product title (id: "heading"), which is white and modern. A bullet-point feature list (id: "description") highlights product qualities beneath, followed by a large gold price tag (id: "price"). A gold call-to-action button (id: "cta_button_background") with black text (id: "cta") completes the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Rich Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Charcoal Grey: `#222222`, `#2A2A2A`, `#292929`, `#333333`
- Gold: `#D4AF37`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and luxurious black handbag accented with elegant gold metals, creating a classic and sophisticated aesthetic. The dominant color is a deep matte black (#1C1C1C), giving the bag a refined and timeless base. The gold elements (#D4AF37) are used strategically on clasps, buttons, charms, and branding to add contrast and draw attention without overwhelming the design. The textures subtly reflect light, enhancing the blending of black and gold while maintaining their distinction. For an advertisement banner, blending these with accents of ivory (#F2F2F2) or muted beige (#E5DCC2) can elevate the upscale feel.
